title: Fix 'ICP Remaining' display to show 515000 ICP correctly

requirements.text: Update the Presale Progress UI so the 'ICP Remaining' value displays the correct cap amount as '515000 ICP' when no contributions have been received, and continues to display the correct remaining amount as contributions come in (cap minus received).

quotes: Bei dem Fenster ICP remaining geh√∂ren  515000 icp geschrieben

acceptanceCriteria: When the presale has 0 ICP received, the 'ICP Remaining' stat shows exactly "515000 ICP" (no thousands separators, no decimals).
When contributions are detected, the 'ICP Remaining' stat updates to (515000 - received) ICP and never goes below 0.
No other Presale Status section labels/content are changed.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Keep the existing presale cap value (PRESALE_CAP_ICP = 515_000) unchanged.
nonGoals: Changing backend presale status calculations or cap enforcement.
Changing the 'Hard Cap' formatting in the Presale Parameters panel unless required to satisfy the 'ICP Remaining' display fix.
